text: @brooklynmutt Kelly Ann pick a polling station and spend the day there on Election Day. Greet the voters . They’d love to see you face I’m sure. That wouldn’t be a problem for you right. I would say go without a mask. Show them how the strong you  are at fighting covid19 . We’ll be watching🤡

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
